meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a virus.
meanings.sent1: The viruslike particles were tiny and easily spread.
meanings.sent2: Her behavior was viruslike, infecting everyone around her with laughter.
meanings.sent3: The way he sneezed was so viruslike, it was almost cute.
meanings.sent4: The rumor spread through the office like a viruslike wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence in the empty hallways felt viruslike, creeping into every corner.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a virus.
meanings.sent1: The plant's viruslike growth pattern puzzled the botanist.
meanings.sent2: The software had a viruslike ability to replicate itself.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's energy was viruslike, spreading chaos wherever he went.
meanings.sent4: The fear in the room was viruslike, infecting even the bravest souls.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the air was viruslike, creating a palpable sense of unease.
